attributes.action: To help Grant Planing to 2 fishing lakes nature walk hedge rows approx 1mile over 80 native trees and managers home at Hanrox Meadows Blunts Lane St Albans Herts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are trying to form 2 fishing lakes at the above address with lots of planting we are forming a nature walk with nature pond also bird boxes owl boxes bat boxes disabled fishing our aim is give people the chance to see the country side change through the seasons the local council turned this down on policy WHY it did not even go in front of the committee even though we submitted it with over 2000 person petition we need your help we are a small family business trying our best to help people see what we are lucky enough to see every day THANKS Graham
